docs.snippet: Paul George had his best game of the series with 23 points and 8 rebounds, and the Indiana Pacers held the Washington Wizards to a franchise-low playoff total on Friday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paul George had his best game of the series with 23 points and 8 rebounds, and the Indiana Pacers held the Washington Wizards to a franchise-low playoff total on Friday night.
docs.abstract: Indiana Pacers beat Washington Wizards, 85-63, taking a 2-1 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinal series; other basketball news noted.

headline.main: Durant Helps Thunder Pull Away From Clippers
headline.print_headline: Washington’s Dismal Night Gives Pacers an Easy Win

docs.snippet: The N.B.A. named Richard Parsons, a prominent business executive, to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as the league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake in the franchise....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. named Richard Parsons, a prominent business executive, to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as the league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake in the franchise.
docs.abstract: NBA names prominent business executive Richard Parsons to lead the Los Angeles Clippers on an interim basis as league moves to strip Donald Sterling of his ownership stake; Parsons was the former chairman of Citigroup and the former chief executive of Time Warner.

headline.main: Ex-Leader of Citigroup and Time Warner Is Appointed to Steer Clippers
headline.print_headline: Ex-Leader of Citigroup and Time Warner Is Appointed to Steer Clippers

byline.original: By SCOTT CACCIOLA and WILLIAM ALDEN

docs.snippet: Without big games from Deron Williams and Joe Johnson, the Nets made Game 2 interesting because of Mirza Teletovic’s shooting and the defense on LeBron James and Dwyane Wade....
docs.lead_paragraph: Without big games from Deron Williams and Joe Johnson, the Nets made Game 2 interesting because of Mirza Teletovic’s shooting and the defense on LeBron James and Dwyane Wade.

headline.main: Nets Need More Than Good Game Plan to Beat the Heat

docs.snippet: The league posted its constitution, which had long been confidential, on its website while it seeks to require Donald Sterling to sell the Los Angeles Clippers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The league posted its constitution, which had long been confidential, on its website while it seeks to require Donald Sterling to sell the Los Angeles Clippers.
docs.abstract: NBA posts its constitution, which had long remained confidential, on its website as it seeks to force Donald Sterling into selling the Los Angeles Clippers; document shows that Sterling's future will hinge on Article 13, which outlines circumstances under which ownership can be terminated; remains unclear how rules will affect Sterling's wife Rochelle, who co-owns team through trust and has pledged to keep control.

headline.main: Rare View Into Inner Workings of N.B.A.
headline.print_headline: Sterling Case Puts Murky Rules in Focus as N.B.A. Reveals Constitution

docs.snippet: The University of Oregon says three basketball players accused of sexually assaulting another student will not return to the team....
docs.lead_paragraph: The University of Oregon says three basketball players accused of sexually assaulting another student will not return to the team.
docs.abstract: Three University of Oregon basketball players accused of sexually assaulting a fellow student in March have been suspended and will not return to the team; University had delayed suspending Brandon Austin, Damyean Dotson and Dominic Artis until after police completed criminal investigation.

headline.main: 3 Suspended in Oregon Sexual Assault Case
headline.print_headline: 3 Oregon Players Suspended in Sexual Assault Case

docs.snippet: Two people were killed and another was missing after a hot air balloon hit a power line and caught fire over Virginia during a festival as horrified witnesses watched from below, police said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two people were killed and another was missing after a hot air balloon hit a power line and caught fire over Virginia during a festival as horrified witnesses watched from below, police said on Saturday.
